resources.string: Tap on the icon below to start/stop phone discoveries

1.All the required permissions should be granted 

2.Make sure the app installed in both the phones properly and the option of Wifi-Direct is enabled in both the phones 

3.Tap on the phone icon on the main screen 

4.Once your friends device is discovered, just tap on the icon with his phones name and you are good to go 

5.Once both the devices are connected, you can use it as a general Walkie-Talkie with the options of Talk And Over
